sentences.cn: " 米尔格维尔的苏珊娜-塔尔伯特小姐呀.
" 车夫塔尔博特告诉俺的.

sentences.en: Accountant John Talbot is a wizard with numbers.
sentences.cn: 会计师约翰·塔尔博特精通数字。

sentences.en: Conn é table Talbot is the second wine of Chateau Talbot.
sentences.cn: 大宝王子是大宝庄园之副牌酒.

sentences.en: He followed her into the compact, orderly kitchen which Walter Talbot had designed himself.
sentences.cn: 他随她走进了沃尔特?塔尔伯特自己设计的紧凑整齐的厨房.

sentences.en: He was remembering the verses Karen had written him after Wally Talbot's electrocution.
sentences.cn: 他想起了在沃利·塔尔伯触电以后,凯伦写给他的诗.

sentences.en: I admit that Talbot is a mere fighting animal.
sentences.cn: 我承认,太而博不过是一头能厮杀的动物.

sentences.en: I can't believe Talbot would go around me like this!
sentences.cn: 真难以相信塔尔伯特居然这样对我!

sentences.en: Many of the drivers couldn't even do it , Talbot said.
sentences.cn: 托尔伯特说, 很多司机们都无法做到.

sentences.en: Sir Evangelist Talbot Lo and behold , the consumer son returns.
sentences.cn: 约翰?塔尔博特爵士:“浪子回头了啊, 儿子. ”

sentences.en: Sir John Talbot Lo and behold , the prodigal son returns.
sentences.cn: 约翰·塔尔博特爵士:浪子回头了啊,儿子.
塔尔博特向前探探身子,天真地问道.

sentences.en: Talbot, Mastiff and Greyhound - Courage, vigilancy and loyal fidelity.
sentences.cn: 塔尔博特犬 、 马士提夫獒犬、灵(犭是)-勇气 、 警惕以及对信念的忠诚.

sentences.en: The letter had arrived on the day that was marred by Wally Talbot's tragic accident.
sentences.cn: 信到的那天正好碰上沃利·塔尔伯特的悲惨事故.

sentences.en: The photograph was taken by William Henry Fox Talbot, the inventor of the negative / positive photographic process.
sentences.cn: 这张照片是由威廉·亨利·福克斯·塔尔博特摄制，他是负片/正片摄影过程的发明者。

sentences.en: The premises of Chabert and Sons were situated by the river and, by coincidence, not too far away from where Eric Talbot had met his death.
sentences.cn: 查伯特父子公司的经营场所位于河边，碰巧的是，那儿离埃里克·塔尔博特身亡的地方不太远。

trans.tran_cn: [男子名] [英格兰人姓氏] 塔尔博特语源不详，可能来源于日耳曼语人名，含义是“破坏+信息”(destroy +message,tidings)，即“破坏的信使”(messenger of destruction)，[地名] [澳大利亚] 托尔伯特
